errors.generic: The bot had a problem while handling the url. Its probably an error in the bot and not with the api.
errors.unknown_user: The user is unknown. Please make sure the user has at least sent a message with the new username

inline.unsupported_details: The video format is not supported. You probably tried sending a Tiktok url with more than one image, its not possible to send them inline with telegram. Check your private messages

api(map).auth.key.missing: An access key is required to use this processing instance but it's missing. add it in instance settings!
api(map).auth.key.not_api_key: An access key is required to use this processing instance but it's missing. add it in instance settings!
api(map).auth.key.invalid: The access key is invalid. Reset it in instance settings and use a proper one!
api(map).auth.key.not_found: The access key you used couldn't be found. Are you sure this instance has your key?
api(map).auth.key.invalid_ip: Your ip address couldn't be parsed. Something went very wrong. Report this issue!
api(map).auth.key.ip_not_allowed: Your ip address is not allowed to use this access key. Use a different instance or network!
api(map).auth.key.ua_not_allowed: Your user agent is not allowed to use this access key. Use a different client or device!
api(map).auth.jwt.missing: Couldn't confirm whether you're not a robot because the processing server didn't receive the human access token. try again in a few seconds or reload the page!
api(map).auth.jwt.invalid: Couldn't confirm whether you're not a robot because your human access token expired and wasn't renewed. try again in a few seconds or reload the page!
api(map).auth.turnstile.missing: Couldn't confirm whether you're not a robot because the processing server didn't receive the human access token. try again in a few seconds or reload the page!
api(map).auth.turnstile.invalid: Couldn't confirm whether you're not a robot because your human access token expired and wasn't renewed. try again in a few seconds or reload the page!
api(map).unreachable: Couldn't connect to the processing server. check your internet connection and try again.
api(map).timed_out: The processing server took way too long to respond. it may be overwhelmed at the moment, try again in a few seconds!
api(map).rate_exceeded: You're making way too many requests. try again in {limit} seconds!
api(map).capacity: Cobalt is at capacity and can't process your request at the moment. try again in a few seconds. if it still doesn't work, let us know and we'll try to help!
api(map).generic: Something went wrong and i couldn't get anything for you. try again in a few seconds, but if issue sticks, let us know and we'll try to help!
api(map).unknown_response: Couldn't parse the response from the server. this could be caused by a version mismatch. are you sure you're on the latest version of cobalt?
api(map).invalid_body: Couldn't send the request to the processing instance. This is probably caused by the web app being out of date. reload the app and try again!
api(map).service.audio_not_supported: This service doesn't support audio extraction. Try a link from another service!
api(map).service.unsupported: This service is not supported yet. have you pasted the right link?
api(map).service.disabled: This service is supported by cobalt, but it's disabled on this instance. try a link from another service!
api(map).link.invalid: Your link is invalid or this service is not supported yet. have you pasted the right link?
api(map).link.unsupported: {service} is supported, but i couldn't recognize your link. have you pasted the right one?
api(map).fetch.fail: Something went wrong when fetching info from {service} and i couldn't find anything for you. are you sure your link works? if it does and you still see this error, let us know and we'll try to help!
api(map).fetch.critical: The {service} module returned an error that i don't recognize. try again in a few seconds, but if issue sticks, let us know!
api(map).fetch.empty: Couldn't find any media that i could download for you. are you sure you pasted the right link?
api(map).fetch.rate: The cobalt processing server got rate limited by the {service} api. try again in a few seconds!
api(map).fetch.short_link: Couldn't get link info from the short link. are you sure it works? if it does and you still get this error, let us know, and we'll try to help!
api(map).content.too_long: The media you requested is too long. current duration limit is {limit} minutes. try something shorter instead!
api(map).content.video.unavailable: I can't access this video. it may be restricted on {service}'s side. have you pasted the right link?
api(map).content.video.live: This video is currently live, so i can't download it yet. wait for the live stream to finish, and then try again!
api(map).content.video.private: This video is private, so i cannot access it. change its visibility or try another one!
api(map).content.video.age: This video is age-restricted, so i can't access it anonymously. try another one!
api(map).content.video.region: This video is region locked, and the processing server is in a different location. try another one!
api(map).content.post.unavailable: Couldn't find anything about this post. its visibility may be limited or it may not exist at all. make sure your link works and try again in a few seconds!
api(map).content.post.private: This post is from a private account, so i can't access it. have you pasted the right link?
api(map).content.post.age: This post is age-restricted, so i can't access it anonymously. have you pasted the right link?
api(map).content.region: This content is region locked, and the processing instance is in a different location. Try a different link!
api(map).content.paid: This content requires purchase. Cobalt can't download paid content. Try a different link!
api(map).youtube.no_matching_format: Youtube non ha restituito una combinazione di formato video + audio valida, manca il video o l'audio. I formati di questo video potrebbero essere ricodificati da youtube o qualcosa è andato storto durante l'analisi. Prova ad abilitare l'opzione hls nelle impostazioni video!
api(map).youtube.api_error: Youtube ha aggiornato qualcosa sulla sua api e non ho potuto ottenere alcuna informazione su questo video. Riprova tra qualche secondo, ma se il problema persiste, segnalalo!
api(map).youtube.temporary_disabled: Il download da youtube è temporaneamente disabilitato a causa di restrizioni da parte di youtube. stiamo già cercando un modo per aggirarle.Ci scusiamo per l'inconveniente e stiamo facendo del nostro meglio per ripristinare questa funzionalità. Controllate i social di cobalt o github per aggiornamenti tempestivi!
api(map).youtube.codec: Youtube didn't return anything with your preferred video codec. try another one in settings!
api(map).youtube.decipher:
Youtube updated its decipher algorithm and i couldn't extract the info about the video.

try again in a few seconds, but if issue sticks, contact us for support.
api(map).youtube.login: Couldn't get this video because youtube labeled me as a bot. this is potentially caused by the processing instance not having any active account tokens. try again in a few seconds, but if it still doesn't work, tell the instance owner about this error!
api(map).youtube.token_expired: Couldn't get this video because the youtube token expired and i couldn't refresh it. try again in a few seconds, but if it still doesn't work, tell the instance owner about this error!
api(map).youtube.no_hls_streams: Couldn't find any matching HLS streams. try different settings!

unauthorized_chat: I'm not authorized to stay here

authorize.chatSuccess: The chat has been authorized successfully
authorize.userSuccess: The user has been authorized successfully

unauthorize.chatSuccess: The chat has been unauthorize successfully
unauthorize.userSuccess: The user has been unauthorize successfully

promote.success: The user has been promoted successfully

demote.success: The user has been demoted successfully

nickname.success: User ${name}'s nickname has been changed successfully

users.success:
Here's a list of the users:
${users}

commands.start: Hello! Send a link from any famous video platform, I'll try to send the video back!
commands.help: Send a link from any famous video platform, I'll try to send the video back
